attributes.action: Provide a crèche for Lewis Sports Centre
attributes.background: Poor weather, lack of childcare and partners who work offshore, prevent many mothers from being able to exercise in the WI.  A crèche would enable mothers to meet, exercise, set healthy examples to their children, combat feelings of isolation / depression and help recover after childbirth.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Services provided at Lewis Sports Centre are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
